#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- editorgamesdk.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("EditorGameSDK.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "EquipPack"
		"EquipPack/EquipPackDialog.cpp"
		"EquipPack/EquipPackDialog.h"
		"EquipPack/EquipPack.cpp"
		"EquipPack/EquipPackLib.cpp"
		"EquipPack/EquipPack.h"
		"EquipPack/EquipPackLib.h"
)

add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"StdAfx.h"
		"StdAfx.cpp"
		"main.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryEditorPlugin(EditorGameSDK PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox/Plugins")

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ..)
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ../../EditorQt/Include)
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} BEFORE PRIVATE ../../EditorQt)
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE ../MFCToolsPlugin)

target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE Sandbox)
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE MFCToolsPlugin)

use_xt()
